programme.title: Kyle está "intestinalmente" envolvido no desenvolvimento de um novo produto revolucionário que será lançado pela Apple chamado HumancentiPad.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle participa do mais recente empreendimento de Cartman, a Associação Atlética de Bebês do Crack.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Associação Atlética de Bebês do Crack

programme.title: Os garotos estão próximos de descobrir a verdade sobre o primeiro Dia de Ação de Graças da história dos Estados Unidos.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Dia de Ação de Graças no History Channel

programme.title: Uma nova garota chega na escola e todo mundo quer saber por quem ela tem uma queda, e Cartman está especialmente animado.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Ike chega à puberdade, mas Kyle se preocupa com o fato de que ele e seu irmão menor estão se distanciando. Dessa forma, Kyle o leva a uma apresentação ao vivo de seu programa de TV favorito.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman facilita a paz mundial com sua última brincadeira, o que leva os líderes religiosos a South Park para testemunhar o acontecimento de uma profecia bíblica.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle não entende por que Ike e seus amigos querem ver as pessoas comentar sobre coisas acontecendo, em vez de experimentá-la por si mesmos. Enquanto isso, Randy tem que apresentar ao vivo para fazer algum dinheiro.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle ainda está pertubado pois Ike e seus amigos o chamam de vovó. Enquanto isso, vários hologramas estão à solta em South Park.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman se considera um critico de restaurante on-line em South Park, e vai visitar o restaurante dos novos moradores da cidade.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Heidi Turner quer iniciar uma dieta vegana com Eric Cartman, enquanto Kyle quer saber o motivo pelo qual ele ainda está com ela. Neste mesmo capítulo, veja como a popularidade do presidente diminui cada dia mais.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O diretor PC começa a nutrir sentimentos amorosos pela vice-diretora da escola. Terrance e Phillip querem assinar um contrato com a Netflix e Kyle está cansado de ser humilhado por Heidi e Cartman.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A mãe de Kyle faz um transplante fecal e os meninos recebem a missão de pegar o melhor microbioma.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes querem se destacar na aula de genética para irritar Terrance e estão tentando fazer um cruzamento entre o elefante de Kyle com a porca do Cartman, "Fofa".
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Um elefante faz amor com um porco

programme.title: Indômita Disputa, (1979, Western)
programme.desc: Pike, Martin Sheen, é um jovem forasteiro da cidade que se vê preso e perdido em meio ao deserto oeste selvagem quando o seu amigo e caçador de peles morre.

programme.title: Bravura Indômita, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Uma garota, Mattie Ross, contrata por 100 dólares um xerife caolho e beberrão, Rooster Cogburn, para que capture o assassino de seu pai.

programme.title: Rastros de Ódio, (1956, Western)
programme.desc: O Veterano de Guerra Civil Ethan Edwards chega aos Texas em 1868 e encontra o seu irmão e a família dele.

programme.title: A Marca da Forca, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Eles o cravaram de balas. Eles o penduraram pelo pescoço. Eles o deixaram para morrer. Mas eles cometeram dois erros fatais: eles tentaram enforcar o homem errado, e não terminaram o trabalho.

programme.title: Viva Django!, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Travado e cheio de chumbo, cortesia de seu ex-amigo, o político inescrupuloso e amante do dinheiro David Barry, Django se vê vagando de uma cidade empoeirada para outra trabalhando como carrasco.

programme.title: O Passado Não Perdoa, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: A família Zachary é uma família rica e influente do Texas, comandada por Ben e sua mãe, além dos outros três filhos, dois meninos e Rachel, que é adotada.

programme.title: Jake Grandão, (2012, Western)
programme.desc: Um velho pecuarista do Texas, que já viveu o ponto alto da vida, entra em ação quando bandidos sequestram seu neto e ferem seu filho.

programme.title: O Irresistível Forasteiro, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Um estranho em uma cidade de gado ocidental se comporta com notável autoconfiança, estabelecendo-se como um homem a ser respeitado.

programme.title: Colina dos Homens Maus, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Um jovem pistoleiro, ferido em uma luta, é escondido e cuidado por artistas de circo. O homem é perseguido por alguns bandidos que querem se apropriar de sua mina de ouro. Quando os bandidos descobrem o esconderijo do pistoleiro, começa uma longa batalha.

programme.title: Valan - Vale dos Anjos, (2019, Crime)
programme.desc: O policial Peter investiga diversos desaparecimentos de jovens mulheres em um caso de rede de tráfico sexual.

programme.title: Até o Fim da Noite, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jimmy Hill é um presidiário que recebe uma proposta irrecusável. Se conseguir pagar a dívida de um velho conhecido, poderá finalmente sair da prisão.

programme.title: Assassinos de Aluguel, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Inspirado na história real de um escândalo que envolveu presidiários sendo liberados por um dia para trabalharem como assassinos de aluguel para políticos corruptos.

programme.title: Uma Aventura Selvagem, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Dois irmãos são atacados por animais selvagens enquanto procuram por seu pai desaparecido no meio da floresta amazônica. Mas à medida em que continuam sua aventura, eles começam a perceber que existe algo muito mais sinistro por trás desses ataques.

programme.title: Crimes Obscuros, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: O policial Tadek investiga um caso de assassinato não resolvido e encontra semelhanças do crime em um livro do artista polonês Krystov Kozlow. Ele começa a investigar a vida do escritor e da sua namorada, uma mulher misteriosa que trabalha num sex club.

programme.title: Acima Da Lei, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma mulher pede a seu ex-marido, um advogado renomado, que defenda seu irmão criminoso, acusado de matar um promotor público.

programme.title: Jogo da Sobrevivência, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. Reagan, uma estrela do atletismo, é sequestrada por uma dupla de sociopatas depois que seu carro quebra em uma estrada deserta para a liberdade.

programme.title: A Maldição do Titanic, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: 110 anos após um dos maiores desastres da história, Titanic III faz sua viagem inaugural até os destroços do navio original. Mas forças sombrias das profundezas do oceano aterrorizam os tripulantes e ameaçam repetir a história.

programme.title: Valan - Vale dos Anjos, (2019, Crime)
programme.desc: O policial Peter investiga diversos desaparecimentos de jovens mulheres em um caso de rede de tráfico sexual.

programme.title: O Semideus, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: Um casal viaja para uma cabana isolada e descobrem a história aterrorizante do local. Não demora até que tenham que enfrentar momentos de puro horror na imensa floresta que os cerca.

programme.title: Fera Da Neve, (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: Uma equipe de pesquisa na natureza selvagem se depara com um monstro aterrorizante.

programme.title: Carnivore: Um Lobisomem de Londres, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: Enquanto tentam reacender seu relacionamento em uma casa de campo remota, Dave e Abi são perseguidos por um segredo aterrorizante

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 6 Cabeças, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: O que deveria ser um acampamento de treinamento de casamento em uma ilha remota se transforma no teste final de sobrevivência quando um tubarão de 6 cabeças começa a atacar a Praia.

programme.title: Mortos Vivos, (2020, Horror)
programme.desc: Um xerife deve resgatar uma família distante de uma montanha durante a erupção de um vulcão e lutar contra uma horda de zumbis cheios de lava trazidos à vida por uma maldição.

programme.title: Ataque do Tubarão Mutante, (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: Um tubarão gigante afunda um barco-escola em alto-mar. Sobreviventes do bizarro desastre refugiam-se em um atol, mas quando a maré começa a subir, o tubarão mutante de duas cabeças ressurge e ninguém está a salvo da fera voraz.

programme.title: Não Adianta Rezar, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A vida de Anna finalmente está entrando nos eixos. Traumatizada depois de um conturbado divórcio e de uma intensa luta para se livrar de sua dependência química, ela finalmente vai se mudar de vida.

programme.title: O Ataque dos Tubarões, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: Grandes tubarões brancos atacam um barco de pesca que se encontra a quilômetros da costa, obrigando os membros da tripulação a lutarem por suas vidas.

programme.title: Necrotério, (2006, Horror)
programme.desc: Uma brincadeira de estudantes universitários se torna mortal quando descobrem que um diretor de funerária pode ter sido libertado de um manicômio um pouco cedo demais.

programme.title: A Maldição do Titanic, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: 110 anos após um dos maiores desastres da história, Titanic III faz sua viagem inaugural até os destroços do navio original. Mas forças sombrias das profundezas do oceano aterrorizam os tripulantes e ameaçam repetir a história.

programme.title: Circus Kane - O Circo dos Horrores, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo é convidado para um misterioso jogo em uma casa de horrores, sob a promessa de um prêmio de 250,000 dólares para aquele que sobreviver.

programme.title: Sesshoumaru pergunta a sua mãe como ele pode expandir o Meido de Tenseiga, o caminho para o submundo. Em resposta, sua mãe usa a pedra Meido que o pai de Sesshoumaru lhe deu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: O Príncipe das Flores é um demônio que se alimenta de corações tristes ou angustiados. Deslumbrado pela fragrância da flor, Inuyasha está envolvido em um sonho falso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: O Espelho Demoníaco rouba a energia demoníaca de Tetsusaiga. Inuyasha contra-ataca, apesar de sofrer alguns golpes ferozes, mas todos os seus ataques apontados para o Espelho Demoníaco acabam sendo tomados por Kanna.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: A fim de derrotar os demônios, Sango reveste Hiraikotsu com veneno. Para purificá-lo do veneno, o Mestre das Poções diz que ela deve derrotar o demônio dentro do jarro.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR
programme.sub-title: OS Sentimentos de Sango, A Decisão de Mirok

programme.title: Shishinki, o Ogre da Morte, aparece diante de Sesshomaru, dizendo a ele que Inuyasha e o pai de Sesshoumaru roubaram seu Meido Zangetsuha em uma batalha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshoumaru fica furioso quando descobre o segredo por trás do Tenseiga. Totosai tenta convencer Sesshoumaru de que ele irá superar seu pai uma vez que ele seja capaz de abandonar seu apego à espada, bem como seu ódio a Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshomaru rouba o poder de Tetsusaiga com Tenseiga, fortalecido pela lembrança de Kanna, um fragmento do Mirror Demon. Inuyasha se transforma em sua forma demoníaca e tenta atacar, mas Sesshoumaru dispara seu Meido Zangetsuha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: A sacerdotisa Hitomiko perdeu a vida nas mãos de Naraku. Mas ela volta à vida e tranca Kagome dentro de uma barreira. Então, o verdadeiro poder espiritual do arco do Monte Azusa se revela!
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e Kaede tentam descobrir o que está bloqueando os poderes de Kagome.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Kohaku permanece inconsciente depois de ser encarado por Magatsuhi, a vontade do mal. Kagome está preocupada, mas ela tem que se curvar e estudar para os exames de admissão, então ela decide voltar para casa.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshoumaru persegue a má vontade, Magatsuhi. Mas é apenas parte de uma armadilha criada por Byakuya dos Sonhos. Magatsuhi encontra Kohaku inconsciente, e ele tenta entregar seu fragmento de Shikon para Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Naraku está atrás do último fragmento de Shikon e ele toma Kagome como refém.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR
programme.sub-title: O Momento da Joia Ficar Completa

programme.title: Kagome se forma no ensino médio e retorna à era feudal. Shippo e Kohaku ficam na aldeia de Kaede, enquanto o resto da gangue se dirige para a batalha de Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: O coração de Inuyasha é devorado pelo veneno da Jóia de Shikon, e ele se transforma em sua forma demoníaca. Ele machuca Kagome e a escuridão em seu coração toma conta dele.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Os poderes espirituais de Kagome são restaurados e a luz divina é revivida na Jóia Shikon de Naraku. No entanto, Naraku usa isso como um chamariz para atrair Sango em sua armadilha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Naraku tem vivido como um demônio apesar de ter um coração humano. Enquanto lutava contra ele, Kagome pergunta sobre seu verdadeiro desejo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Naraku se dirige para o Poço do Comedor de Ossos e desaparece! Antes de desaparecer, Naraku faz seu último desejo para Kagome, ferido pelas mãos de Byakuya, ser engolido em Meido, o caminho para o submundo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Quando a última pessoa a obter a Jóia Shikon faz o único desejo correto, a jóia será purificada e desaparecerá inteiramente deste mundo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Anos após ser selado, Inuyasha, o meio-youkai é acordado por uma garota do ensino médio chamada Agome, que viajou no tempo atraves do poço Come-Ossos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Garota que Volta no Tempo e o Garoto Lacrado

programme.title: Concedido o poder de controlar Inuyasha, Agome descobre que ela pode ser a reencarnação da irmã mais velha de Kaede, Kikyo, que selou Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: As Pessoas Atrás da Joia de Quatro Almas

programme.title: Agome e Inuyasha precisam das habilidades do outro para reunir os fragmentos dispersos da Jóia de Quatro Almas, mas os dois não se dão bem.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Volta Através do Poço Come-Ossos

programme.title: De volta ao presente, Agome está relaxando em casa quando Inuyasha vem procurá-la, e ela retorna com ele ao passado para encontrar Yura.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O meio irmão de Inuyasha, Sesshomaru, aparece procurando pelo túmulo de seu pai que era um youkai-cachorro. Agome aprende sobre o passado de Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Apesar da ajuda de Agome em frustrá-lo, Sesshomaru descobre a localização do túmulo do pai de Inuyasha, que contém uma espada que ele deseja.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Tessaiga, O Canino de Aço Destruidor

programme.title: Agome é capaz de puxar a espada Tessaiga para fora do altar, e Sesshomaru tenta matá-la, irritando Inuyasha e provocando um duelo de irmãos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e Agome encontram um jovem samurai chamado Nobunaga cujo senhor foi possuído por um youkai Sapo, e eles partiram para resgatar uma princesa.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Senhor Feudal Youkai, Sapo Tsukumo

programme.title: Em sua jornada, Inuyasha e Agome encontram Shippo, um jovem youkai raposa que rouba um pedaço da Jóia para vingar seu pai assassinado.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Entra em Cena Shippo! Os Irmãos Youkai Relâmpago

programme.title: Inuyasha duela com Hiten enquanto Shippo tenta usar sua magia para resgatar Agome de Manten, mas os Irmãos Relâmpago não serão derrotados tão facilmente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Confrontro Fantasma: Irmãos Relâmpago vs. Tessaiga

programme.title: Quando Agome retorna ao presente, o poder da Jóia de Quatro Almas incita uma antiga máscara de noh para atacar seu avô.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Máscara de Maldição que Ressuscita na Época Atual

programme.title: Inuyasha vê um youkai chamado Tatarimokke que guia benevolentemente os espíritos das crianças, enquanto Agome encontra o espírito de uma garota chamada Mayu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Tatarimokke e o Pequeno Espítiro Mau

programme.title: Depois que Inuyasha e Agome resgatam uma garota chamada Nazuna, eles passam a noite juntos em um santuário e aprendem mais sobre a transformação de Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Segredo do Primeiro Dia: O Inuyasha de Cabelos Pretos

programme.title: Inuyasha e os outros encontram a Feiticeira Urasue, que rouba o túmulo de Kikyo, a sacerdotisa que selou Inuyasha. Ele está determinado a impedi-lá.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Roubo dos Ossos Sagrados da Kikyo

programme.title: Para trazer Kikyo de volta à vida, Urasue sequestra Agome. Quando Kikyo é revivida, ela imediatamente tenta matar Inuyasha com raiva.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Renascimento da Infeliz Sacerdotisa Kikyo

programme.title: Joseph e Avdol ficam presos um ao outro por causa do Stand inimigo. Quando eles finalmente conseguem se separar, acabam prendendo os pés em um trilho de trem.

programme.title: Hol Horse chega ao aeroporto do Cairo com ordens para matar Jotaro e seus aliados. Dentro da mala, ele traz um novo e relutante parceiro.

programme.title: Hol Horse age de acordo com a profecia do livro, mas começa a questionar tudo quando Jotaro e o resto do grupo aparecem.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O guardião do inferno Pet Shop – Parte 1

programme.title: Kakyoin perde a alma em um jogo de corrida contra D’Arby. Joseph escolhe um jogo que é a especialidade do mordomo e leva uma bronca de Jotaro.

programme.title: Mesmo estranhando as atitudes de Jotaro, D'Arby se mantém confiante graças ao Stand. Avdol e os outros entram na mansão.

programme.sub-title: O miasma do vazio, Cool Ice – Parte 1

programme.sub-title: O miasma do vazio, Cool Ice – Parte 3

programme.title: Polnareff finalmente enfrenta DIO, mas não consegue se aproximar. De longe, ele libera sua arma secreta para revelar o Stand de seu terrível oponente.

programme.title: Para tentar salvar Koichi, Josuke vai à casa de Okuyasu Nijimura, mas é atacado por seu irmão, Keicho. Josuke propõe um acordo a Okuyasu, que está ferido.

programme.title: Josuke e Koichi decidem encontrar o arco e flecha e destruí-lo para impedir que haja mais vítimas. Eles o encontram no sótão, mas escutam um som estranho.

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A colega de escola Yukako Yamagishi confessa seu amor por Koichi. Ele fica muito feliz, mas ela acaba indo longe demais.

programme.title: Koichi tenta fugir, mas é impedido por Yukako e perde a esperança. Quando ela vai até um telefone público, algo inesperado acontece.

programme.title: Josuke e Okuyasu vão a um novo restaurante italiano que é meio esquisito. Okuyasu acha a água deliciosa, mas seu corpo tem uma reação estranha.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Red Hot Chili Pepper, que matou Keicho e roubou o arco e flecha, aparece diante de Josuke. Jotaro conta a Josuke e aos outros dois sobre um cara.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Seguindo as ordens de Jotaro, Josuke e Koichi ficam no porto e procuram Chili Pepper. O usuário do Stand aparece e acredita que pode vencê-los.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke reluta, mas tenta convencer o pai a voltar para casa. Joseph causa todo tipo de problema e diz que um usuário de Stand está por perto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Koichi e Hazamada estão felizes de visitar a casa do famoso artista de mangá Rohan Kishibe, mas logo se assustam com ele.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Vamos para a casa do desenhista – Parte 1

programme.title: Rohan diz que Koichi o inspira a criar um mangá. Quando ele está prestes a aproveitar Koichi para sua arte, alguém bate à porta.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Vamos para a casa do desenhista – Parte 2

programme.title: Jotaro pede ajuda a Josuke para caçar um rato que consegue usar um Stand. Depois, eles encontram algo bizarro no canal de irrigação onde o rato foi visto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Expedição Kon-Tiki, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Em 1947, apesar do medo da água e da incapacidade de nadar, Heyerdahl decidiu testar sua teoria. Ele e cinco companheiros navegam do Peru em uma jangada de madeira construída com um design antigo.

programme.title: Deus da guerra, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Na dinastia Ming, onde o jovem general Qi Jiguang conquista uma importante vitória contra os piratas japoneses, comandando o exército chinês. Quando, quatro anos depois, sua nação é mais uma vez atacada, Qi se vê obrigado a retornar aos campos de batalha.

programme.title: Wu Kong - Contra a Ira dos Deuses, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Há muitos anos, o Monte Huaguo foi destruído pelo Reino Celestial, a morada dos deuses da mitologia chinesa, deixando Sun Wu Kong, o Rei Macaco, furioso, já que o local era seu lar. Kong está decidido a confrontar aqueles que determinaram seu destino.

programme.title: Em Busca do Paraíso, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Forçado fazer uma jornada perigosa, um nobre guerreiro se depara com inúmeras dificuldades, lugares misteriosos, magia e aventura para chegar ao que seria o paraíso distante.

programme.title: D Artagnan O Quarto Mosqueteiro, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: A mando de seu pai, o jovem d’Artagnan viaja da Gasconha rural para Paris, onde se envolve em uma trama desonesta entre os mosqueteiros do rei e os guardas do cardeal Richelieu.

programme.title: Império Proibido, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: No início do século 18, o cartógrafo Jonathan Green empreende uma viagem científica da Europa para o Oriente. Passando pela Transilvânia e cruzando as montanhas dos Cárpatos, ele encontra uma pequena vila perdida na floresta.

programme.title: As Tartarugas Ninja 2: O Segredo do Ooze, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: Tartarugas Ninja buscam novo lar nos esgotos de Nova York e enfrentam o Destruidor, que usa o Ooze para criar capangas. Com ajuda de April, Jordan e Keno, precisam detê-lo.

programme.title: Thor: Deus do Trovão, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: O inescrupuloso Loki escapou de Asgard e está à procura de Yggdrasil, a árvore que contém toda a força do universo. Ele planeja destruí-la e replantá-la à sua imagem e semelhança.

programme.title: Crônicas da Tribo Fantasma, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Quando fósseis gigantes são descobertos perto da Mongólia, uma expedição é organizada para analisá-los. Quando uma explosão deixa os membros da equipe de escavação enterrados no subsolo, eles descobrem um templo ciclópico e bestas gigantes antigas.

programme.title: O Justiceiro, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial problemático disfarçado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacável. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se vê lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua família.

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: O Vingador Marcial, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Depois de matar um adversário em uma luta clandestina, um campeão de artes marciais e MMA vê sua vida virar de cabeça para baixo quando uma gangue rival, em busca de vingança, mata sua esposa durante um ataque de vingança.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caçador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresário em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: O Matador - Missão Resgate, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele está cuidando é sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: Cão de briga, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma máquina de matar, (Jet Li) é campeão de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: Aliança Mortal, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Um grande carregamento de drogas desaparece entre a fronteira Canadá-Estados Unidos. Os traficantes de drogas que o procuram obrigam um guarda florestal, um ex-membro das Forças Especiais, a ajudá-los a encontrar a droga.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A Retaliação, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Kurt Sloan prometeu a si mesmo que não voltaria para a Tailândia, mas alguém o seda e o força a retornar ao país asiático.

programme.title: O Dragão Invencível, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Um agente da polícia à paisana procura vingança contra um sindicato do crime implacável após o assassinato do seu parceiro.

programme.title: Trapeze, (1956, Drama)
programme.desc: Aerialist Burt Lancaster--who retired after suffering an injury--agrees to train aspiring trapeze artist Tony Curtis. But when both men fall in love with the beautiful and ambitious Gina Lollobrigida, the triangle threaten the dreams of them all.

programme.title: The Night of the Hunter, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: Robert Mitchum stars in an unforgettable role as a psychopathic preacher in the relentless pursuit of two children who have their dead father's stolen fortune hidden in a doll. Shelley Winters co-stars.

programme.title: Oliver Twist, (1948, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: In Charles Dickens' classic tale, an orphan wends his way from cruel apprenticeship to den of thieves in search of a true home.

programme.title: Great Expectations, (1946, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: A humble orphan boy in 1810s Kent is given the opportunity to go to London and become a gentleman, with the help of an unknown benefactor.

programme.title: The Vikings, (1958, Thriller)
programme.desc: Legends Kirk Douglas, Tony Curtis, Ernest Borgnine and Janet Leigh dazzle in this epic chronicle of brutal rivalry and bloodthirsty ambition as two brothers are locked in a battle that will decide their fate...and that of a beautiful princess.

programme.title: The Buccaneer, (1958, Action)
programme.desc: General Andrew Jackson's dependence on the help of pirate Jean Lafitte to repel the British is complicated by the Governor's daughter. Set in New Orleans during the War of 1812.

programme.title: A Shot in the Dark, (1964, Comedy)
programme.desc: Peter Sellers and Elke Sommer star in this successful sequel to The Pink Panther in which Inspector Clouseau tries to prove a beautiful parlor maid is innocent of killing her chauffer lover.

programme.title: The Rat Race, (1960, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A saxophonist (Tony Curtis) tries to share an apartment platonically with a dancer (Debbie Reynolds) in New York.

programme.title: Sweet Smell of Success, (1957, Crime)
programme.desc: A columnist and a press agent tear into the maelstrom of midtown Manhattan's night creatures in a sinister game that involves money, power and ultimately survival.

programme.title: Hyena Road, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Three men, three different paths, caught in conflict but brought together to save lives: a highly skilled sniper who can’t think of his targets as human, an intelligence officer who has never killed while on duty.

programme.title: Accident Man, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mike is a tough hitman, who makes his hits look like accidents or suicide. He's in a gang of hitmen, each with his own style. When his loved ex is killed, Mike looks for those responsible.

programme.title: Rogue Warfare, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Stephen Lang (Avatar) stars in the action-packed Rogue Warfare. An international team of highly trained special ops soldiers is assembled for a covert mission in Afghanistan.

programme.title: Bloodsport, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Ninjitsu master Frank Dux journeys to Hong Kong to enter the Kumite, the Olympics of martial arts, and meets a beautiful American reporter. Before long he must face Chong-Li, a vicious Korean master of Tae Kwan Do, in a climactic fight to the finish.

programme.title: The Mechanic, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: In this action-packed thriller, Jason Statham is a mechanic—an elite assassin with a strict code and unique talent for cleanly eliminating targets. Simon West (CON AIR) directs this hit remake of the 1972 Charles Bronson movie.

programme.title: Crank, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Today is the last day of hit man Chev Chelios' life. He has been given a poison that will kill him if he allows his heart to settle into a normal rhythm. In order to stay alive and take revenge, Chev must keep his adrenaline elevated by any way possible.

programme.title: Crank 2 High Voltage, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: In this high-octane sequel, hitman Chev Chelios (Statham) launches himself on an electrifying chase through Los Angeles in pursuit of the Chinese mobster who has stolen his nearly indestructible heart.

programme.title: The Mechanic, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: In this action-packed thriller, Jason Statham is a mechanic—an elite assassin with a strict code and unique talent for cleanly eliminating targets. Simon West (CON AIR) directs this hit remake of the 1972 Charles Bronson movie.

programme.title: Braveheart, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: William Wallace, a commoner, unites the 13th Century Scots in their battle to overthrow English rule.

programme.title: Alone, (2020, Horror)
programme.desc: During a global pandemic, a man must battle swarming hordes of the undead to rescue a female neighbor. This zombie horror tale stars Tyler Posey, Summer Spiro, and Donald Sutherland.

programme.title: The Wolf of Snow Hollow, (2020, Horror)
programme.desc: A small-town sheriff and his lackluster team of officers must solve a series of brutal murders that are occurring on the full moon. As he's consumed by the hunt for the killer, he struggles to remind himself that there's no such thing as werewolves…

programme.title: Texas Chainsaw, (1970, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: A young woman inherits an isolated mansion from a distant relative, but an unspeakable horror awaits her in the mansion's dank cellars.

programme.title: The Ruins, (2008, Horror)

programme.title: Silent House, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: When Sarah finds herself sealed inside her family's secluded lake house with no contact to the outside world, panic soon turns to terror as events become increasingly ominous.

programme.title: The Ruins, (2008, Horror)
programme.desc: "The Ruins" follows a group of friends who become entangled in a struggle for survival after visiting a remote archaeological dig in the Mexican jungle where they discover something deadly living among the ruins.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: In mysterious Venice, Joseph and Caesar begin training under the equally enigmatic Lisa Lisa. Let the Hamon “hell” begin!

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Under Lisa Lisa’s tutelage, Joseph and Caesar must endure their final test. But while Caesar hones his skills, Joseph is stunned by an ancient and unexpected foe.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Joseph returns to Lisa Lisa, unaware of the bizarre stowaway he has delivered. A possessed confidant then attacks, ultimately sending the crew to Switzerland, where another revelation awaits.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: A Race Toward the Brink
programme.desc: Stroheim is back from the brink, now as a cyborg designed to secure the great Red Stone. Kars, however, is not willing to concede and wages war, even as the stone hurtles toward an alpine cliff.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Lisa Lisa paints a picture of honor when she reveals Caesar’s tragic past to Joseph. Meanwhile, in the face of certain danger, Caesar enters into a solitary battle to avenge his father.

programme.desc: Courtroom thriller about a slick, hotshot lawyer (Richard Gere) who takes the seemingly unwinnable case of a young altar boy (Edward Norton) accused of murdering an eminent catholic priest.

programme.title: Most Beautiful Island, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: An undocumented woman struggling in NYC is offered an opportunity she can’t refuse, but soon discovers she’s involved in a dangerous game. Grand Jury Award Winner of SXSW 2017. Official Selection of BAMCinemaFest, Fantasia Fest, and Sidewalk.

programme.title: Pi, (2023, Thriller)
programme.desc: A paranoid mathematician searches for a key number that will unlock the universal patterns found in nature. Pushed to his limits, he spirals between brilliance and obsession in this gripping, groundbreaking debut from Darren Aronofsky.

programme.title: Snake Eyes, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: Set in Atlantic City, an assassination attempt thrusts a detective into a murder case with 14,000 potential suspects and a deadly conspiracy where nothing is what it appears to be.

programme.title: Primal Fear, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Courtroom thriller about a slick, hotshot lawyer (Richard Gere) who takes the seemingly unwinnable case of a young altar boy (Edward Norton) accused of murdering an eminent catholic priest.

programme.title: Out of Time, (2003, Thriller)
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars in this spell-binding thriller as the Chief of Police of a small town who finds himself caught in the eye of a storm as he investigates the murder of a woman he was secretly seeing….because all the evidence points to him!

programme.title: Killerman, (2019, Crime)
programme.desc: LIAM HEMSWORTH stars in this gritty action thriller. After a car crash leaves money launderer Moe Diamond with no memory, millions in cash, and dirty cops hunting him down, he must race to survive in New York City's criminal underworld.

programme.title: Thunderheart, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: Val Kilmer, Sam Shepard and Graham Greene star in this murder mystery filled with style and suspense. Kilmer stars as Ray Levoi, a hotshot FBI agent who's thrust into a strange new world when he is sent to solve a murder on an Indian reservation.

programme.title: Six Degrees of Separation, (1993, Drama)
programme.desc: When compassionate Manhattan art dealers (Stockard Channing and Donald Sutherland) take in a young man (Will Smith) who has been stabbed in Central Park, their world turns amusingly upside down.

programme.title: Titanic, (1997, Romance)
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Oscar-nominee Kate Winslet light up the screen as Jack and Rose, the young lovers who find one another on the maiden voyage of the "unsinkable" R.M.S. Titanic.

programme.title: Amistad, (1997, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: AMISTAD is about a 1839 mutiny onboard a slave ship that is traveling towards the Northeast Coast of America. Much of the story involves a court-room drama about the slave who led the revolt.

programme.title: Eighth Grade, (2018, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Thirteen-year-old Kayla endures the tidal wave of contemporary suburban adolescence as she makes her way through the last week of middle school—the end of her thus far disastrous eighth grade year—before she begins high school.

programme.title: Titanic, (1997, Romance)
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Oscar-nominee Kate Winslet light up the screen as Jack and Rose, the young lovers who find one another on the maiden voyage of the "unsinkable" R.M.S. Titanic.

programme.title: Amistad, (1997, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: AMISTAD is about a 1839 mutiny onboard a slave ship that is traveling towards the Northeast Coast of America. Much of the story involves a court-room drama about the slave who led the revolt.

programme.title: Selma, (2014, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: From the Oscar-winning producers of 12 Years a Slave comes a powerful true story starring David Oyelewo and Oprah Winfrey. Facing violent opposition, Martin Luther King, Jr., led a historic march from Selma to Montgomery, changing the world forever.

programme.title: The Conspirator, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: From director Robert Redford comes the riveting true story behind the assassination trial of Abraham Lincoln – including the lone woman who was accused of plotting his murder.

programme.title: Texas Rangers, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: After the Civil War, Texas is at the mercy of murderous bandits. A group of unlikely heroes emerges to battle these renegade outlaws. Out-manned, they summon the courage to protect the innocent put the wrong things right in their beloved homeland.

programme.title: Gunless, (2010, Western)
programme.desc: An American gunslinger is repeatedly thwarted in his attempts to mount a showdown in a friendly town in Canada where no one seems to understand or appreciate the brutal code of the American Wild West.

programme.title: The Jade Pendant, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: The Old West becomes a battleground for power and revenge in this gripping epic based on true events. A young Chinese woman, Ying-Ying, finds herself on a boat to America after escaping the clutches of a bad arranged marriage.

programme.title: Union Bound, (2016, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: Sargent Hoover went to war to preserve the Union. After being captured and sent to a prisoner of war camp, he understood what it was to be kept against his will. Together with a friend he escaped and aided by slaves made it to freedom.

programme.title: Sanctified, (2022, Western)
programme.desc: A thrilling Western set in 1890 North Dakota, 'Sanctified' is the tale of an outlaw rescued from death by a nun traveling the Badlands. A deep friendship develops as she nurses the man back to health in exchange for his guidance at a local church.

programme.title: Gunless, (2010, Western)
programme.desc: An American gunslinger is repeatedly thwarted in his attempts to mount a showdown in a friendly town in Canada where no one seems to understand or appreciate the brutal code of the American Wild West.

programme.title: Woman Walks Ahead, (2018, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this riveting western follows a headstrong New York widow (Jessica Chastain) as she journeys west to meet Sioux chief Sitting Bull, facing off with an army officer (Sam Rockwell) intent on war with Native Americans.

programme.title: Lawless, (2012, Crime)
programme.desc: Shia LaBeouf, Tom Hardy, and Jessica Chastain star in this adaptation of 'The Wettest County in the World.' A bootlegging gang make a run for the American Dream during Prohibition.

programme.title: Sweetwater, (2013, Western)
programme.desc: In the late 1800s, a fanatical religious leader, a renegade Sheriff, and a former prostitute collide in a blood triangle on the rugged plains of the New Mexico Territory.

programme.title: The Host, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over humans' bodies and erasing their minds, Melanie Stryder risks everything to protect the people she cares about most, proving that love can conquer all in a dangerous new world.

programme.title: Labyrinth, (1986, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah must solve a labyrinth to rescue her baby brother when he is taken by the Goblin King.

programme.title: Ne Zha, (2019, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A young boy, with the power to destroy the world, must choose between good and evil in order to break the shackles of fate and become the hero.

programme.title: Super 8, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the summer of 1979, a group of friends in a small Ohio town witness a catastrophic train crash while making a Super 8 movie and soon suspect that it was not an accident.

programme.title: The Time Machine, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Hoping to alter the events of the past, a 19th-century inventor instead travels 800,000 years into the future, where he finds humankind divided into two warring races.

programme.title: The Phantom, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: The story begins as an expedition lands on the island of Bengalla, seeking the skulls of Touganda. Believed to harness an energy force of power, they could spell disaster for mankind.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: A gifted ensemble cast sparks this bold retelling of Alexander Dumas’ classic tale of friendship and heroism. With Christoph Waltz as wily Cardinal Richelieu.

programme.title: The Time Machine, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Hoping to alter the events of the past, a 19th-century inventor instead travels 800,000 years into the future, where he finds humankind divided into two warring races.

programme.title: Hereditary, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: When the matriarch of the Graham family passes away, her daughter (Toni Collette) and grandchildren begin to unravel cryptic and increasingly terrifying secrets about their ancestry, trying to outrun the sinister fate they have inherited.

programme.title: Downsizing, (2017, Dramedy)
programme.desc: When scientists find a way to shrink humans to five inches tall, Paul and his wife decide to get small and live large in a luxurious downsized community. With endless possibilities in the tiny world, Paul realizes we are meant for something bigger.

programme.title: Scary Movie, (2000, Comedy)
programme.desc: The spoof that started it all. Scream with the Wayans brothers, Carmen Electra, Shannon Elizabeth, and Anna Faris as they bumble and shriek their way to horror-movie hilarity in Scary Movie.

programme.title: Scary Movie 2, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Four teens are tricked by their professor into visiting a haunted house for a school project.

programme.title: Scary Movie 3, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: David Zucker (AIRPLANE!) directs SCARY MOVIE 3, which piles on hysterical, yet gratuitous, cameos with thrillers, blockbusters, and pop-culture in general getting their best goosing yet.

programme.title: Adventureland, (2009, Screwball)
programme.desc: From the director of SUPERBAD comes a coming-of-age comedy of big dreams, hysterical consequences, and young love, set in a run-down amusement park.

programme.title: Warrior, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: WARRIOR tells the moving and inspirational story of the Conlon family, Brendan (Joel Edgerton), Tommy (Tom Hardy) and Paddy (Nick Nolte), who find redemption in the ring as they fight to repair themselves and their family.

programme.title: Scary Movie, (2000, Comedy)
programme.desc: The spoof that started it all. Scream with the Wayans brothers, Carmen Electra, Shannon Elizabeth, and Anna Faris as they bumble and shriek their way to horror-movie hilarity in Scary Movie.

programme.title: Scary Movie 2, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Four teens are tricked by their professor into visiting a haunted house for a school project.

programme.title: Citizen Ruth, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this outrageous satire, Laura Dern is Ruth Stoops, an irresponsible, care-free drug addict pregnant for the fifth time, horrifying everyone around her. Soon, Ruth's at the forefront of a national debate, when all she wants to do is party.

programme.title: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: For three showgirls it was the dream of a lifetime, a four week cabaret engagement in Alice Springs. The problem is simply getting there intact, along with their bus Priscilla. It's not easy being a drag queen in the outback!

programme.title: The Cooler, (2003, Drama)
programme.desc: Bernie Lootz (William H. Macy), is the unluckiest man in Vegas. His bad luck is so contagious that Shelly Kaplow (Alec Baldwin), the last of the old-time mobsters, uses Bernie to kill the high rollers' action at his casino.

programme.title: Swingers, (1996, Screwball)
programme.desc: In this laugh-out-loud indie comedy classic that launched the careers of its outstanding cast, two friends set out to rewrite modern dating from Los Angeles to Las Vegas.

programme.title: Citizen Ruth, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this outrageous satire, Laura Dern is Ruth Stoops, an irresponsible, care-free drug addict pregnant for the fifth time, horrifying everyone around her. Soon, Ruth's at the forefront of a national debate, when all she wants to do is party.

programme.title: Tank Girl, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: In this laugh-a-minute, futuristic thriller, a mega-villain controls the world's water supply, and it's up to Tank Girl and her outrageous cohorts to end his greedy reign.

programme.title: Bats, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: Genetically mutated bats escape, and it's up to a bat expert and the local sheriff to stop them.

programme.title: Winnie The Pooh: Blood and Honey, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: Winnie-The-Pooh: Blood and Honey follows Pooh and Piglet as they go on a rampage after Christopher Robin abandons them.

programme.title: Faceless After Dark, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: Following her breakout success as the star of a killer clown horror flick, Bowie now finds herself struggling to capitalize on its success. But when she is held hostage by an unhinged fan posing as that same killer clown, horror becomes her reality.

programme.title: Hell House LLC., (2016, Horror)
programme.desc: Five years after an unexplained malfunction causes the death of 15 tour-goers and staff on the opening night of a Halloween haunted house tour, a documentary crew travels back to the scene of the tragedy to find out what really happened.

programme.title: 31, (2016, Horror)
programme.desc: From the visionary mind of Rob Zombie comes a story of five carnival workers who are kidnapped and forced to fight for their lives against an endless parade of homicidal maniacs.

programme.title: Lords of Salem, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: From the singular mind of horror maestro Rob Zombie comes a nightmare world where evil forces from a Salem, Massachusetts legend unleash terror upon the modern-day town.

programme.title: The Little Mermaid, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: Beauty is both deceiving and dangerous in this dark twist on Hans Christian Andersen's classic tale, as an underwater discovery draws an innocent man into a mermaid's evil world.

programme.title: Abattoir, (2016, Horror)
programme.desc: A young reporter happens upon a series of gruesome murders tied to real estate mysteries, where entire rooms have been dismantled and pulled from their foundations.

programme.title: The Haunting In Connecticut, (2009, Horror)
programme.desc: After a family is forced to relocate for their son's health, they begin experiencing supernatural behavior in their new home, which turns out to be a former mortuary and séance parlor.

programme.title: The Haunting in Connecticut 2: Ghosts of Georgia, (2013, Horror)
programme.desc: When a family moves from the city to a centuries-old house in rural Georgia, they are terrorized by malicious spirits seeking revenge.

programme.title: Hereditary, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: When the matriarch of the Graham family passes away, her daughter (Toni Collette) and grandchildren begin to unravel cryptic and increasingly terrifying secrets about their ancestry, trying to outrun the sinister fate they have inherited.

programme.title: It Comes At Night, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: After a mysterious apocalypse leaves the world with few survivors, two families forced to share a home form an uneasy alliance in an attempt to keep the outside evil at bay—only to learn that the true horror may come from within.

programme.title: Rain Man, (1988, Drama)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars as an idealistic young wheeler-dealer whose life is changed forever when he discovers he has an autistic savant older brother (Dustin Hoffman, in a Best Actor Oscar-winning performance).

programme.title: My Left Foot, (1989, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Winner of two Academy Awards, including Best Actor Daniel Day-Lewis and Best Actress Brenda Fricker, this is the inspiring true story of a man who defied the odds to become a well-known author, artist, and activist.

programme.title: Raging Bull, (2020, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: RAGING BULL is director Martin Scorsese's lacerating film biography of middleweight boxing champion Jake LaMotta, who was known during his brief reign as "the Bronx Bull."

programme.title: On Golden Pond, (1982, Romance)
programme.desc: Norman is a curmudgeon with an estranged relationship with his daughter Chelsea. At Golden Pond, he and his wife nevertheless agree to care for Billy, the son of Chelsea's new boyfriend, and a most unexpected relationship blooms.

programme.title: Tender Mercies, (1983, Drama)
programme.desc: Winner of two Academy Awards®, TENDER MERCIES is a compassionate love story tracing the relationship between a burnt-out country western star and the young widow he meets in a small Texas motel.

programme.title: Rain Man, (1988, Drama)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars as an idealistic young wheeler-dealer whose life is changed forever when he discovers he has an autistic savant older brother (Dustin Hoffman, in a Best Actor Oscar-winning performance).

programme.title: My Left Foot, (1989, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Winner of two Academy Awards, including Best Actor Daniel Day-Lewis and Best Actress Brenda Fricker, this is the inspiring true story of a man who defied the odds to become a well-known author, artist, and activist.

programme.title: Bull Durham, (1988, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: The story of a minor-league North Carolina baseball team (the Triple A Durham Bulls) and its attentive, intelligent groupie who feels it is her mission to live with one young player per season and help him mature.

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: This confrontation between good and evil stars Kevin Costner as federal agent Eliot Ness, Robert De Niro as gangland kingpin Al Capone, and Sean Connery as Malone, the cop who teaches Ness how to beat the mob: shoot fast and shoot first.

programme.title: War of the Worlds, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A contemporary retelling of H.G.Wells' classic, the sci-fi thriller reveals the extraordinary battle for the future of humankind through the eyes of one American family.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: The Saint, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Want someone to infiltrate a top-secret organization or steal a scientific formula that could change the world? For the right price, The Saint is your man.

programme.title: Coneheads, (1993, Science fiction)
programme.desc: One look, and you know they're from a very strange place. They're from New Jersey, by way of France, by way of far-off, far-out Remulak. They're Coneheads.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Nearly twenty years after the cult TV show Galaxy Quest was cancelled, the alumni cast is asked for help by an alien species in order to save the universe.

programme.title: Popeye, (1980, Comedy)
programme.desc: The legendary, beloved anvil-armed sailor of the seven seas comes magically to life in this delightful musical, starring Robin Williams as Popeye, who meets all challenges with the unshakable philosophy, "I yam what I yam and that's all that I yam."

programme.title: Tommy Boy, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Tommy's earned his diploma and a job at Callahan Auto Parts. However, the family business starts tanking and now Tommy hits the road with his dad's right-hand man, a smug numberscruncher.

programme.title: Coneheads, (1993, Science fiction)
programme.desc: One look, and you know they're from a very strange place. They're from New Jersey, by way of France, by way of far-off, far-out Remulak. They're Coneheads.

programme.desc: In the late 1980s, a low level gangster named Jackie DiNorscio defends himself in court in what became the longest criminal trial in American judicial history.

programme.title: Chinatown, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jake Gittes, a private eye, uncovers a web of personal and political scandals while he is hired by a beautiful socialite to investigate her husband's extra marital affair.

programme.title: The Yards, (2000, Crime)
programme.desc: After being released from prison, Leo Handler (Mark Wahlberg) takes a job with his powerfully influential Uncle Frank (James Caan). Leo soon finds himself unwittingly drawn into a world of sabotage, high-stakes payoffs, and even murder.

programme.desc: A trio of American astronauts become instant heroes as they plant the Stars and Stripes on Mars before beginning the voyage home. But back on their ship, something else has set its sights on Earth, something whose relatives have already paid us a visit.

programme.title: Species III, (2004, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the ongoing fight for supremacy between mankind and the human-alien hybrids, a fatal hybrid weakness has given humans the advantage. Until now.

programme.title: Fire In The Sky, (1993, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In 1975, logger Travis Walton (D.B. Sweeney) and his co-workers discovered a hovering UFO. Walton's pals fled, but Walton was not so fortunate. Whisked aboard the strange craft, he was subjected to a painful, unearthly medical study.

programme.title: Annie Hall, (1977, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Woody Allen is in prime form in this celebrated comedy and 1977 Best Picture Oscar®-winner in which he portrays a highly neurotic comedy writer who falls head-over-heels in love with a naive small-town girl (Diane Keaton) who aspires to be a singer.

programme.title: King of New York, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: Recently freed from prison, Frank White (Christopher Walken) begins to exterminate the drug lords who rose to power in his absence. When a group of enraged cops declares war on him, Frank's answer is to put a contract out on the cops.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)

programme.title: The Getaway, (1994, Crime)
programme.desc: An ex-con and his devoted wife must flee from danger when a heist doesn't go as planned.

programme.title: King of New York, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: Recently freed from prison, Frank White (Christopher Walken) begins to exterminate the drug lords who rose to power in his absence. When a group of enraged cops declares war on him, Frank's answer is to put a contract out on the cops.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: Runaway Bride, (1999, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Julia Roberts plays a small-town girl whose marches down the aisle become a series of near Mrs. when she bolts before saying "I do."

programme.title: Big Night, (1996, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: In a restaurant run by two Italian immigrants, the tables sit empty despite the extraordinary talents of Primo the chef (Tony Shalhoub, “Monk”) and the ambitious efforts of his brother Secondo (Stanley Tucci).

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever, (1976, Music)
programme.desc: John Travolta performs as the troubled Tony Manero - Brooklyn paint store clerk by day and undisputed king of the dance floor by night. A powerful and provocative urban tragedy that carries as much significance today as it did in 1977.

programme.title: Midnight Cowboy, (1969, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: This Academy Award-winning Best Picture stars Dustin Hoffman and Jon Voight in standout, Oscar-nominated performances as a con man and a Texas hustler trying to survive on the tough streets of New York. The legendary John Schlesinger directs.

programme.title: Boy in the Plastic Bubble, (1976, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: The girl next door makes a teen (John Travolta) born with immune deficiencies want to leave his germ-free bubble.

programme.title: Meatballs, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Bill Murray stars as Tripper who guides a fun-seeking collection of lovable campers and libidinous staff members through the unique pleasures of a hysterical coed summer experience.

programme.title: The Bank Shot, (1974, Screwball)
programme.desc: Fresh from his recent jailbreak, criminal mastermind George C. Scott is already plotting his next bank heist. This time he's thinking big...he's not just taking the loot, he's stealing the whole bank in a film brimming with imaginative silliness.

programme.title: The Gambler, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: James Caan portrays a compulsive gambler who can't quit or win. He falls into debt to the mob for $40,000 but seems to relish the thrill of gambling against the long shot.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever, (1976, Music)
programme.desc: John Travolta performs as the troubled Tony Manero - Brooklyn paint store clerk by day and undisputed king of the dance floor by night. A powerful and provocative urban tragedy that carries as much significance today as it did in 1977.

programme.title: Meatballs, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Bill Murray stars as Tripper who guides a fun-seeking collection of lovable campers and libidinous staff members through the unique pleasures of a hysterical coed summer experience.

programme.title: Semi-Tough, (1977, Comedy)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Haunted by the memories of his last battle with Kalin, Yusei looks to bury the past by agreeing to duel his former friend in a rematch. Can Yusei defeat Kalin and seal the tower that this Dark Signer is guarding?

programme.desc: As the rematch between Kalin and Yusei continues, Yusei must find a way to out-think and out-maneuver the dark power of Kalin's Earthbound Immortal before it sends him to the Netherworld forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Roman challenges Yusei to a Shadow Duel at the site of the original Ener-D Reactor. Meanwhile, Director Goodwin decides to make an unexpected visit to the Satellite Sector to settle some unfinished business he has with his Dark Signer brother.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the battle between Yusei and Roman rages on, Roman takes a time out to reveal the truth behind the original Ener-D Reactor's meltdown and the role Yusei's father played.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Jack agrees to Turbo Duel Carly in an effort to defeat the darkness that has taken control of her. Can Jack rid the evil that has come to possess this one-time roving reporter?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Jack kicks his duel into overdrive and summons his Red Dragon Archfiend in a desperate attempt to free Carly from the Dark Signers' control.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Hoping to finally find out the whereabouts of her long-lost brother, Misty challenges Akiza to a Shadow Duel in a maze of mirrors.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After unlocking Akiza's psychic powers, Sayer sets his sights on using them to get even with the Dark Signers for destroying the Arcadia Movement.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Yusei, Jack and Crow face off against Goodwin in the ultimate Shadow Duel showdown.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With the safety of the world hanging in the balance, Yusei, Jack and Crow look to tip the scales in their favor by setting their sights on Goodwin's Earthbound Immortal.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With his life points running on empty, Yusei looks to rev it up one last time in order to defeat Goodwin and save the world from the destructive powers of the King of the Netherworld!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: A mysterious new threat arrives on the scene in New Domino City, forcing Yusei to take to the streets and track down a rogue Turbo Duelist known as The Ghost.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With his life points on the line, Yusei must figure out a way to take down Ghost's Meklord Emperor Wisel before Wisel's special ability throws his game and his runner into a tailspin.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When Vice Chancellor Rudolph Heitmann threatens to expel all the members of Leo and Luna's class from Duel Academy, Yusei attempts to teach the teacher a valuable lesson by challenging the Vice Chancellor to a duel to keep his friends in school.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When Crow is asked to convince an old friend of Martha's to move into her retirement home, Crow decides to tackle the task by challenging the old man to a trash-talking junkyard duel. Can Crow convince the old man to relocate?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When a loan shark starts sinking his teeth into New Domino City, Jack decides to reel in this money-grubbing menace for good by putting his most prized possessions on the line in a duel.

programme.desc: When Leo and Luna decide to go exploring a nearby forest rumored to be haunted by wicked spirits, they soon discover that the rumors are all too real when a mysterious boy traps Luna in his house and challenges Leo to a duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Yusei wakes up to find himself trapped in the back of a big rig with a bump on his head and no way out. After a mysterious tip leads Akiza to Yusei's location, the two friends soon find themselves Turbo Dueling an unfamiliar foe.

programme.desc: As the battle between Yusei and Sherry races on, Sherry reveals some shocking secrets about the upcoming World Racing Grand Prix. Meanwhile, Akiza begins to gain a new understanding and appreciation for Turbo Dueling while riding shotgun to Yusei.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Before heading out to the event of the year - The World Racing Grand Prix Gala - Yusei challenges Jack to a Turbo Duel in the hopes of finding a new dueling strategy that doesn't involve the use of Synchro Monsters.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: A mysterious duelist named Vizor offers to show Yusei a new dueling strategy known as The Synchro Solution.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Akiza goes to get her Turbo Dueling license, but before she can drive off into the sunset, she first has to out-duel, out-maneuver and out-smart one of Sector Security's finest for her final exam.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After a string of Duel Runner thefts has New Domino City on high alert, Jack Atlas decides to take justice into his own hands and ventures out in search of those responsible.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When a mysterious new student gives Luna a-one-of-a-kind Duel Board, Leo, trusting his instincts, steps up and tries to pull a 180 on their friendship.
programme.sub-title: Dawn of the Duel Board: Part I

programme.desc: As the Duel Board battle between Leo, Luna and the mystery duelist continues, Leo soon realizes that their mysterious opponent is actually an all-too-familiar friend.
programme.sub-title: Dawn of the Duel Board: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Jack and Crow set out to find a restless Yusei - hoping to ease his mind and reinforce the friendship they share by Turbo Dueling down memory lane.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's

programme.desc: Yusei and the gang trail Lazar to the local mall hoping to reacquire the engine design program that this window-shopping, noodle-eating crook stole from them.

programme.desc: Yusei and Lazar are trapped in a warehouse where their only chance of escaping is if Yusei can outduel a Guard Bot whose CPU has been uploaded with all of Yusei's battle techniques.
programme.sub-title: Get With the Program: Part II

programme.desc: After being charged with crimes he didn't commit, Jack Atlas scrambles to uncover the truth before his friends and fans turn their back on him for good.
programme.sub-title: Will The Real Jack Atlas, Please Stand Up: Part I
